lines.gurmukhi: irD isD inD suDw pwrs klpqru kwmDynu icMqwmin lCmI sÍmyv kI
lines.transliteration_english: Ridh Sidh Nidh Sudhaa Paaras Kalapataru , Kaamadhaynu Chintaamani Lachhamee Svamayv Kee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: All wealths, miraculous powers, so-called elixirs, philosopher stones, heavenly-trees and cows, pearl that frees a person from all worries and even goddess Lakshami (goddess of wealth) are paltry,

lines.gurmukhi: cqur pdwrQ suBwv sIl rUp gun Bukq jukq mq AlK AByv kI
lines.transliteration_english: Chatur Padaarad Soubhaav Seel Roop Gouna , Bhoukat Joukat Mat Alakh Abhayv Kee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The four elements, piety of character, righteousness, beautiful form, virtues, relishment of material wisdom and means of uniting with inaccessible and indiscriminating Lord are also paltry,

lines.gurmukhi: jÍwlw joiq jY jYkwr kIriq pRqwp Cib qyj qp kwNiq ibBY soBw swD syv kI
lines.transliteration_english: Jvaalaa Joti Jai Jaikaar Keerati Prataap Chhabi , Tayj Tap Kaanti Bibhai Sobhaa Saadh Sayv Kee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Shining miraculous intellect, praise of the world, glory and grandeur, power, penance, revolutionary praise, luxurious living and service of the holy-men is also no match.

lines.gurmukhi: AnMd shj suK skl pRkws koit ikMcq ktwC kiRpw jwNih gurdyv kI ]612]
lines.transliteration_english: Anand Sahaj Soukh Sakal Prakaas Koti , Kinchat Kataachh Kripaa Jaanhi Gurdayv Kee ?612?

Shabad OS B.translation: A momentary glimpse of grace by the True Guru provides a slave Sikh with all the bliss, ecstasy, happiness and millions of radiances, who has been blessed with consecration of Lord's name by the Guru.  (612)
